title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Microsoft SQL Server Innovation on AWS | Let's Talk About Data

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This session covers RDS for SQL Server updates announced at re:Invent 2025, including Developer Edition support, M7i/R7i instance support with optimized CPU, and expanded storage up to 256 TiB. It also reviews new SQL Server features on AWS EC2 (including SQL Server 2025), cost-optimization, storage, compute and tooling improvements, and demos performance gains on the latest-generation instances.
bullets: RDS for SQL Server: Developer Edition support added.
New instance support: M7i and R7i with optimized CPU for SQL Server.
Expanded RDS storage options up to 256 TiB.
SQL Server 2025 and new cost, storage, compute, and tooling features on EC2.
Live demo of SQL Server performance gains on latest-generation instances.
takeaways: Lower Microsoft licensing costs via Developer Edition support can reduce overall SQL Server TCO.
Up to 256 TiB storage enables consolidation of larger databases on RDS for SQL Server.
M7i/R7i instance support and CPU optimizations promise measurable performance improvements on modern instances.
Availability of SQL Server 2025 on EC2 plus new tooling supports migration, modernization, and cost-optimization strategies.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Daniel Tom, 31, owns Bay Area Sanitation, which operates nearly 2,000 portable toilets serving construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area. The company reported $4.3 million in total income in 2025.
bullets: Owner: Daniel Tom, age 31.
Company: Bay Area Sanitation.
Fleet: almost 2,000 portable toilets.
Service areas: construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area.
2025 income: $4.3 million.
takeaways: Portable sanitation is a sizable, organized service in the Bay Area—evidenced by a nearly 2,000-unit fleet and $4.3M income.
For projects with on-site work or events, established local providers can supply large-scale sanitation capacity.
Include sanitation vendor capacity and contracting in site planning for construction or event operations.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video presents route planning made easy as Jo discovers the power of Copilot Groups. It positions Copilot Groups as a tool to simplify route planning workflows within the Microsoft Copilot ecosystem.
bullets: Promotes route planning made easy.
Follows Jo discovering Copilot Groups.
Frames Copilot Groups as a powerful tool.
Messaging tied to Microsoft Copilot and AI.
Concise, promotional focus on Copilot Groups
takeaways: If your operations involve route planning (for example, maintenance rounds or on-site workflows), Copilot Groups may be relevant because the video emphasizes simplifying route planning.
Assess whether Copilot Groups can map onto existing team/group workflows to improve coordination and task organization.
Because the content is framed within the Microsoft Copilot/AI ecosystem, evaluate potential integration with other Copilot tools you already use.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as a current, practical reality at KPMG, with tools such as AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI and the KPMG Clara platform enabling full-population analysis, conversational assistance, real-time management and improved client communication. The episode also addresses how these technologies change auditors' roles and required competencies, and flags challenges around adoption, data security, regulation and AI-related risks.
bullets: AI Transaction Scoring Tool enables analysis of full populations instead of sampling.
Clara AI provides conversational assistance and specialized agent support for auditors.
KPMG Clara platform manages audits in real time and Clara for Clients modernizes client communication.
AI aids documentation, disclosure analysis and shifts auditors' roles and needed skills.
Key challenges covered: adoption, auditor adaptation, data security, regulatory environment and potential AI risks.
takeaways: Expect audits to move from sampling to full-population analysis—prepare to provide and govern larger data sets for review.
Real-time audit platforms and conversational assistants can speed issue identification and client communication—plan for tighter operational collaboration with auditors.
Prioritize data security, access controls and regulatory compliance when sharing systems or telemetry with auditors leveraging AI.
Invest in internal skills to interpret AI-driven findings and coordinate with auditors as their role evolves toward oversight and exception analysis.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the NVIDIA GeForce trailer showcases the game running with DLSS 4 and Multi Frame Generation. The footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield is a newly launched 3D real-time strategy RPG.
Trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (MFG).
Footage captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Official game site and social channels are linked in the description.
NVIDIA GeForce published and promoted the launch trailer.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being used in commercial releases — verify hardware and driver support for DLSS 4 when provisioning GPUs.
Capture used an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra, indicating high-performance consumer GPUs are being showcased for 4K, AI-accelerated rendering workflows.
Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode may affect throughput and quality trade-offs for real-time rendering pipelines — consider testing MFG modes in lab environments before deployment.
Ensure software stacks and game/demo environments are compatible with NVIDIA's latest features when planning demos, remote workstation setups, or GPU-accelerated services.
